functions.name: validateToken
functions.signature: public TokenClaims validateToken(String token) throws TokenExpiredException, InvalidTokenException
functions.description: Validates a JWT token and returns the claims

functions.name: generateToken
functions.signature: public String generateToken(String userId, Role role)

types.name: Role
types.definition: public enum Role { ADMIN, USER, GUEST }

types.name: TokenClaims
types.definition: public class TokenClaims { userId: String, role: Role, exp: long, iat: long }

types.name: TokenConfig
types.definition: public class TokenConfig { secret: String, expiresInSeconds: long, issuer: String }

classes.name: TokenExpiredException
classes.description: Exception thrown when token has expired

classes.name: InvalidTokenException
classes.description: Exception thrown when token is invalid
